titles.title: Expanding Whistleblower Protections for Contractors Act of 2024
Expanding Whistleblower Protections for Contractors Act of 2023
Expanding Whistleblower Protections for Contractors Act of 2024
A bill to ensure that whistleblowers, including contractors, are protected from retaliation when a Federal employee orders a reprisal, and for other purposes.
